version_description:
- Fixed bugs;
- Screenshots design updates;
- Added apprater.

- improved stability with weak internet connection
- various small bug fixes
- added method for filtering objectionable content
- added mechanism for users to flag objectionable content
- added mechanism for users to block abusive users
- added a paragraph for terms and conditions (EULA) regarding the objectionable content
- crashes fixed

-possibility to double your likes within the app added (check it out!);
-fixed bugs with purchases;
-fixed bugs with "Share with friends" feature;

- Added possibility to rate the app and check out our other apps from the settings.
- Added possibility to see your 'fan' list. Check who likes you the most.
- Added possibility to show you in the world rating using one tap.
- Fixed minor bugs.

- Added possibility to rate the app and check out our other apps from the settings.
- Added possibility to see your 'fan' list. Check who likes you the most.
- Added possibility to show you in the world rating using one tap.
- Fixed minor bugs.
